name: Time Wizard Dodge
description:
Controls

Left click to move player.

Space key to cast INTERMISSION and slow down time, this consumes Mana.

The lower your Mana, the faster your player speed.

Try and stay alive for as long as possible.

Theme

Intermission: Time pause/slow down.

Losing is good: The lower your mana, the faster your player speed is to run away from projectiles and enemies.
